title: North Ottawa County USD 239
text:
North Ottawa County USD 239 is a <a href="Public%20school%20%28government%20funded%29">public</a> <a href="unified%20school%20district">unified school district</a> headquartered in <a href="Minneapolis%2C%20Kansas">Minneapolis, Kansas</a>, United States. The district includes the communities of Minneapolis, <a href="Delphos%2C%20Kansas">Delphos</a>, <a href="Ada%2C%20Kansas">Ada</a>, <a href="Lindsey%2C%20Kansas">Lindsey</a>, <a href="Sumnerville%2C%20Kansas">Sumnerville</a>, <a href="Wells%2C%20Kansas">Wells</a>, and nearby rural areas.
Schools.
